name: @synthetixio/treasury-market
description: V3 Market to allow a trusted entity to manage excess liquidity on behalf of stakers

scripts.build:contracts: hardhat compile --force && yarn storage:dump && CANNON_REGISTRY_PRIORITY=local hardhat cannon:build
scripts.build: rm -rf lib && forge install foundry-rs/forge-std --no-git && yarn build:contracts
scripts.build-testable: rm -rf lib && forge install foundry-rs/forge-std --no-git && cannon build cannonfile.test.toml --write-script script/Deploy.sol --write-script-format foundry --wipe
scripts.test: rm -rf lib && forge install foundry-rs/forge-std --no-git && forge test
